website_summaries.verdict: A professional-grade tool organizer that can be used alone or as part of other storage components. Its heavy weight is the price to pay for toughness.
pros: Stackable with other DeWalt organizer boxes, or can be hooked onto a cart
Clear lid allows quick view of available tools and small parts
Compartments and bins can be customized somewhat
cons: Plastic is brittle and edges can break off easily, even with moderate handling
Hinge pins can slide out easily
Very heavy for its size when loaded up

customer_reviews.title: Love this system
customer_reviews.text: Love this system! I purchased all of the tough system boxes and wall racks. Converted them into a van rack system. These things are by far the best setup I have used in my van. I am a professional handyman/renovation guy. I do not know how to make the van any more efficient besides some small tweaks and usage of the space behind the boxes. I have added some foldable arms to one side so I can make more room for large packages. Awesome Job Dewalt!
customer_reviews.author: Chad Gaglioti

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt NOT standing by their warranty. Ignoring official, formal request for warranty support.
customer_reviews.text: Handle broke off. 1.5 moths of homeowner use... Talked with Dewalt about their warranty... . Filed a claim, so-to-speek. Sent Photos.. DEWALT iS NOT EVEN RESPONDING.... I WOULD THEREFORE URGE EXTREME CAUTION WHEN BUYING THIS PRODUCT LINE... MANY product physical design flaws. Warranty support seems non-existant.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Ward

customer_reviews.title: Handle shattered; DeWalt doesn't care.
customer_reviews.text: I had the clear lid toolbox DWST08202 sitting on top of a large box - so about 18" off the ground. I knocked it and it fell down. The handle shattered. I'd be willing to buy the handle but DeWalt does not sell it as a separate item. DeWalt's only response was that I could return the whole box to them and they would evaluate it. If in their opinion, the failure was due to a manufacturing defect, then they would replace it. Needless to say, I'm not going to return it. I can only see that leading to frustration and shipping costs on my part. Sorry, DeWalt but you get a big fat goose-egg on this one.
customer_reviews.author: George W

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt "Tough" system not as tough as you think.
customer_reviews.text: These cases have many nice features and they do keep the stuff inside dry. They are not nearly as tough as they need to be. I have purchased 2 small, 2 extra large and several power tools in these tough cases. I carry my tools in a pickup so keeping them dry is important. The bad part of this review is the plastic on these cases is brittle and breaks easily. Every one of the cases have pieces broken off. I don't throw them around. This happens while loading them in and out of the bed of my truck. I am afraid to put anymore tools in the extra large case. I don't think it would handle it.
customer_reviews.author: John W.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for anyone with a small garage or someone who just wants to be organized. Mine isn't even mounted or sitting on the ground it and it's loaded to the brim.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Could have much stiffer uprights
customer_reviews.text: I love the Dewalt Tough System but this racking could stand improvement. I was going to use them in a tool trailer but I found that even with the two mounting bars and the feet securely fastened in place there was significant flexing of boxes on the arms. The arms themselves are fine, it is the square tubing uprights that would be better if they were one piece and/or heavier metal. We will see how they hold up bumping down the road,
customer_reviews.author: Harry Coover

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt cooler
customer_reviews.text: This great goes right on the tough rolling system holds ice forever well not forever but long time.....
customer_reviews.author: Kal El

customer_reviews.title: Best tool box storage system to date
customer_reviews.text: Best tool box storage system to date, love it, took out back seat to my king cab pickup truck installed this system ( nobody sits there, my tools are there anyway, why not orginize them ) , fits 6 box's in height , can take out bottom box an the rest stay , as is often the case, what you need is ALWAYS on the bottom, now not a problem. very pleased with this Dewalt system .
customer_reviews.author: D .F

customer_reviews.title: I found another use
customer_reviews.text: I found another use for the DEWALT tough system tool boxes. I wanted and needed a compact and strong, as well as stackable system for a so called solar generator I was building. The DEWALT Tough System is roomy, very strong and durable, very mobile and fit my needs perfectly. The Extra Large toolbox fits atop my DEWALT DS450 Mobile Storage box adding total flexibility and portability. As you can see in the pictures, the DEWALT Tough System was the best choice for my project. I highly recommend the DEWALT Tough Sytem to anyone looking for a great value. I give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Repro63

customer_reviews.title: Quality control is lacking!
customer_reviews.text: This is a review of the new drawer system. The one I received had a top drawer that wouldn’t close at all and a bottom one that I couldn’t get open. Once I finally did the latch wasn’t seated properly, I fixed that and at the same time swapped the top and bottom drawer and solved the issue with the top drawer not opening. Let’s see how it holds up with some actual use. A little skeptical to be honest... Edit/update: after first day of use the bottom drawer does not stay closed. I dumped my impact, drill, multitool down a flight of stairs. Dewalt you should be embarrassed with this product...
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: No Good product
customer_reviews.text: I am a Dewalt user but here is one the bad design. I do not recommend this product. All of the drawers after one month of use started having problems to open and close, I hope the company can refund my money when they see this review, I need to put one star but really this product does not deserve any!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cesar

customer_reviews.title: Solid tool drawers
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these even though there were negative reviews about the top drawer. I found the top drawer did not latch as anticipated by reading the reviews. The top drawer needed extra effort to get it to latch. After about ten time of getting into it it was fine. I purchase a second one and it did not exhibit this issue. I am please with my system. I can add more over time if I wish or stop here. These are great if you do not need a full tool box.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde Layton

customer_reviews.title: This is a great addition to my dewalt boxes
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to my dewalt boxes. I could have used a few more of the rails, but I bought 2 of the collapsible kind (the 5 sets included do not collapse) and now I have everything nice and organized and easily accessible. Installation was pretty easy – I blasted PT 2x4s into the floor and 3 spots in the wall to secure the rack to. I needed to provide the screws/bolts to secure to the 2x4s, but everything else was included and went together easily. It seems very sturdy and everything stays put.
customer_reviews.author: Mom and Physician

customer_reviews.title: Phones dont fit, Great quality, no pause or skip buttons.
customer_reviews.text: No pause or skip buttons for when your phone isn't easy to access.. Phones dont fit. Samsung s9+, LG4, iphones.. Kinda defeats the purpose of that compartment. Great sound though, omg. Love the charger also. Says 100ft range but I can't go more than the other side of an enclosed front porch with objects... outside my garage or even the other side of yard or out of the room down a hallway...... probably my phone.. but I do have an s9+ which is brand spanking new top of the line...
customer_reviews.author: Gesture

customer_reviews.title: DEWALT TOUGHSYSTEM RADIO - The reviews are true. It's awesome
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical. I thought the reviews for the stereo were overrated. No. The sound is beautiful. Clear top to bottom with plenty of low end. Not the cheapest bluetooth portable stereo, but the combination of best in class sound, the 12/20v Flexvolt charge/power integration, and the compatibility with the toughsystem, cases make this worth every penny. I regret not getting it sooner. Really.... The sound is the best portable system sound I've experienced. Better than monster, JBL, ION, etc period. I'm so so impressed.
customer_reviews.author: J.. Lovitt

customer_reviews.title: Saves a ton of space and time
customer_reviews.text: I mounted two of these in my trailer that I use for remodeling. They have held up well for three 21 hundred mile round trips three states over. Definitely helps to keep thing organized. I'm not digging through collapsed buckets searching for stuff either. Saves tons of space and makes it super easy to move around the trailer with other equipment. I can stack and lock them to carry into the job site and stuff gets put back away where it goes before it ever gets back to the trailer to get randomly tossed in at quiting time. Boxes seem pretty darn sturdy so far. They've been caught in the rain without leaking as well. No complaints on these.
customer_reviews.author: Kato

customer_reviews.title: Not Tough Enough
customer_reviews.text: Although the shipping box arrived intact, the Dewalt large toolbox inside did not. It had two large cracks in the back, and the item had to be returned for a refund. This was not the heavy duty product I had been expecting based on past experience with the Dewalt brand. From what I observed, I don’t believe this toolbox would survive everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: texfed

customer_reviews.title: I'm a big fan of good music the radio is built is excellent for a ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of good music the radio is built is excellent for a portable, durable radio. Well laid out no complaints there. I feel like there could of been a few slight changes that would of put this radio top notch, dosent charge larger battery's like 60v "they don't fit in the housing. Should of added a heavy duty cord and a couple of outlets. And my biggest complaint why is there no locks for the tough system, what the hell were they thinking.
customer_reviews.author: D. easter

customer_reviews.title: Not happy and unsure of a warranty after using it for ...
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my husband who is a carpenter for his birthday. The sealed compartment does not seal complete...it has a ton of sawdust inside. It is not working now as the on and off button has fallen inside the machine. Not happy and unsure of a warranty after using it for 8 months. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: julie hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 3 replacements due to poor QC
customer_reviews.text: Great, product. I love the idea. But I have to send them back multiple time have given up. Every single box I was delivered had issues with the rubber seal, or the drawers no closing properly (warped center support and drawer face). Packaging from amazon could be a little better also. One of the boxes arrived cracked.
customer_reviews.author: cr

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: My brother in law helped me with a project. I decided to buy him a thank you present. He made mention that he wished he had better storage for his cordless Dewalt tools. They were in a bag. I bought him this and he loved it. I didn't know if it would fit all his cordless tools. He loved it so much he bought himself a 2nd one, that was smaller. Between the two they hold all his cordless tools as well as accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Love this radio.  Many features including an equalizer.  I bought 3 of them.
customer_reviews.text: The engineering quality is evident as in all DeWalt tools. The controls are simple, well laid out and I charge its battery by plugging the radio into AC..when I need a portable blue tooth, AM-FM, iPod or any other device compatible via plug in, the radio is ready to go. Charger fits into the radio...so does you phone. Great sound. First Class. Every seller I bought from was sterling; honest and trust worthy. I am very pleased with all 3 of them. One is below my TV running blue tooth and is acting as my stereo....the bluetooth connection works flawlessly. One in my house, one in my cabin. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Denis Allen

customer_reviews.title: Love this system
customer_reviews.text: Love this system! I purchased all of the tough system boxes and wall racks. Converted them into a van rack system. These things are by far the best setup I have used in my van. I am a professional handyman/renovation guy. I do not know how to make the van any more efficient besides some small tweaks and usage of the space behind the boxes. I have added some foldable arms to one side so I can make more room for large packages. Awesome Job Dewalt!
customer_reviews.author: Chad Gaglioti

customer_reviews.title: Another solid product
customer_reviews.text: The tough system line is worth every penny and then some. Dewalt is seriously ahead of the curve with everything they're producing lately. It almost makes you forget it's the same company as black and decker! I'm a carpenter by trade and I feel like I should get paid for advertising with how much of Dewalts tools are spread around my job sites, but you honestly can't beat the quality. If you're curious test it out. You won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tough toolbox
customer_reviews.text: Well built, feels heavy duty, and plenty of compartments. Compared it to other brands dewalt gives you more options to organize. Like the fact that it’s waterproof and keeps loose items firmly in its compartments. Only gripe is the weak plastic hinges for the top lid, which already shows signs of fatigue and close to breaking off. If you let it hang without resting it correctly, you’ll stress the hinges and eventually break off. Outside of that this toolbox is very well made and recommended.
customer_reviews.author: K S K

customer_reviews.title: Not tough at all
customer_reviews.text: Worked great and had best sound I’ve heard from a portable radio, bought Jan 20 and now middle of March it no longer works, says low battery no matter what battery I use, I have over 15 DEWALT 20v batteries. Never abused or damaged in any way still looks brand new, even still has the film on the screen. wish amazon would refund me but since it’s over 30 days and I threw out the box guess I’m sol
customer_reviews.author: CA

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else,then maybe Dewalt will fix the known issues.
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth connectivity is spotty,tried 4 different phones.Cord sucks.Battery falls out when stood up like a boom box if moved at all.The reason I am writing this is the fact that it shuts off due to being over heated.The day I bought it I had it on my boat with an ambient temp of 85F and it was in the shade and kept shutting off due to heat.I work on 100F roofs so this will not work for me.Not what I expected from Dewalt. Sound is just OK. My JBL Charge has better sound,just not as loud.I am sending this back.I read the reviews and ignored the negatives because I love Dewalt products,don't make the same mistake.
customer_reviews.author: I love amazon

customer_reviews.title: Don’t push the limits on it and it won’t fail you
customer_reviews.text: Great quality don’t listen to the bad reviews, they are reviewing the older version of this which is poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: D. scharrer

customer_reviews.title: Check products before you ship them, and package them correctly as well, Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered to me and the walls of the tool box were concave as if it were stored improperly and as such the water tight seal was no longer water tight due to the plastic being warped. I did my own repairs to it and made it water proof yet again. Now, on the other hand it fits most tools I need for my career, that and the drill case attached to the top with the interlocking design makes it very unique and awesome. Also, is pretty lightweight so carrying it around isn't an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Good sounding radio that is durable and works well.
customer_reviews.text: I am a house painter and got tired of going through a boombox every two years and being stuck with only radio and cd's and with Spotify I can listen forever. This radio sounds great for the size and design, have not messed with tone settings at all but the bass is not just one tone and bluetooth range is alright. It mutes when I get a phone call and has a sturdy build. Something I don't like it the storage lid is hard to close and would like a power outlet but can plug my phone in and charge a 20v. battery. At 200.00 a bit pricey but so far feel it is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: kreekatt

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Storage Ability - Well Designed Dewalt Tool Box
customer_reviews.text: If you have the Tough Box System you will love this tool box which now proudly sits hanging upon my wall with my other Dewalt Tool Boxes It is a typical Dewalt Design- Built to Last! It is a sturdy commercial grade plastic that I have actually sat on while working on other things. No I would NOT stand on it. But yes I used it as a seat. You will not be disappointed with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: ROB n VICKI

customer_reviews.title: Love the cases but the valves don't work.
customer_reviews.text: I have, 4 DWST08202, 2 DWST08201, 1 DWST08203, and 1 DWST08204 and will be buying 2 more DWST08201 and the cart. Love them, problem though, of all the cases (with a valve) only one has a valve that will tighten, they all just keep turning. Not sure that means much to me as mine stay in the van but those of you who will have them on a trailer may need to check them closely. If anyone knows how to fix this or replace them without having to ship it back and wait for a replacement, leave a comment. I use these daily.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Wick

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, also heavy
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent tool box. The tray inside could be a little thicker but otherwise, this entire product is a brute. I also purchased the screw container and the one tool box that has two drawers. All three lock together and that's how they are being used in my 5th wheel basement currently. These are not light items even when empty so if that's an issue you really need to look elsewhere. I weigh north of 250 lbs, and I would stand on this box without hesitating. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RSG

customer_reviews.title: sounds great
customer_reviews.text: I am a DeWalt fan boy so... I m also a profesinal builder and remodeling contractor. Ive been using Dewalts tools for almost 30 years. So far, the tough system is one of my favorets. This radio works flawlessly with the system and it sounds great. The blue tooth range is almost to good. The phone and plug storage is a little awkward to open and its a tight fit for my phone with an otterbox case. Some of the newer/larger phones will not fit. Overall, its a great addition to my setup.
customer_reviews.author: saywhat?

customer_reviews.title: The seem nice and sturdy but they really have not held up ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 5 and three of them broke in 6 weeks. Handles snapped off one, top latches broke off another. And the drawer cabinet fell apart in 1 week. The seem nice and sturdy but they really have not held up at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sal Delorenzo

customer_reviews.title: Good but need improvements
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, better then expected bass, radio picks up well, and good value. Cons. Don’t take new wider batteries, batter life not very long with 2ah batteries, radio signal not as strong when charging battery, I also had to try several times to get the battery to sit right to get it to charge. Last the charger is not as fast as stand alone chargers
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: So far it's working out great I mounted it in the front of my trailer ...
customer_reviews.text: So far it's working out great I mounted it in the front of my trailer for storage. Only concern would've if it will take the abuse of bouncing down the road.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best choice for outdoor work
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for getting a lot of tools and fasteners to the site in one trip. If you remodel indoors a lot though and have to get through doorways, maybe consider the tstak. I would still stick with this system. I lost it to a shop fire recently and bought the system again because I also do decks and outside work so I love the ability to easily traverse rough terrain but if I did only kitchens and bathrooms I'd get the tstak. And I'm not a dewalt lover. I have makita. But the drawer options with the dewalt gear is the way to go
customer_reviews.author: steve carlson

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive picture showing 2 pack, received one.  Great case, price for one not so great.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought other versions of this case through Amazon and through local big box store. I like them. In buying this case, the picture clearly states "2 pack". This would be an exceptional deal since it is only a few dollars more than what I would spend for one at the local store carrying this product. It is not such a great deal if you only receive only one case. It is one of the few times I have had this happen to me. Seller must update picture to reflect actual item.
customer_reviews.author: Phunny2

customer_reviews.title: Drawers will slide open on their own!
customer_reviews.text: These seem well built, and are much heavier to carry than I expected. But I don't like that the drawers have no kind of detent or latch. If the box tips forward when lifted, they easily slide fully open. I took 2 stars off for that. I'll have to find a way to keep the drawers from rolling open when I carry this box. ------ Keep in mind these do NOT fit the TSTAK system. They are a different size and style.
customer_reviews.author: BuckeyeShopper

customer_reviews.title: Will Easily Become An Heirloom
customer_reviews.text: Tons of room in this tool box. Great interior design and sturdy as all heck. The only drawback is the discomfort level unlocking the box. The latches are thinish metal and very uncomfortable to grab hold of (don't let the use of the word "thin" make you think they are not strong because they certainly are). The latches are a minor fault overall. I will be purchasing other pieces in this collection.
customer_reviews.author: L. Benton

customer_reviews.title: I need 10 of these.
customer_reviews.text: I need 10 of these things to keep all my parts organized. Very tough and I can tell will not break as easily as the other brands you can find out there. I've had a lot of different brands of organizers with the clear lids and the lid on this box is very tough. The lid also stays very tight when carrying the case vertically by the handle. Most clear lid organizers would pop the locks off if I carry them vertically.
customer_reviews.author: Cbb24

customer_reviews.title: New Design is a must have
customer_reviews.text: So far... this thing is exactly what I needed. I wanted to buy the old model but after reading the reviews I waited. This new design seems tough, it has watertight gasket around the drawer, full extensions, and seems very well built... I'll update in few weeks... but i already ordered a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Green

customer_reviews.title: A hardcase for a circular saw.
customer_reviews.text: One tough case. I wanted a hard case for my circular saw. Since my Dewalt circular saw didn't come with a hard case nor was one available I had to find a substitute. This more than filled the bill. It is definitely on the heavy side. The one negative there isn't a foam insert system available and tstak system from Dewalt isn't adaptable to this case. So, I went to a foam fabricator and got the foam I needed. I could of had them do a die cut to fit the saw to the case but I felt I could do it myself. This gave me the time to plan my layout and it works to a T.
customer_reviews.author: Carl J. Kulow

customer_reviews.title: Good mobile storage
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband this Christmas and he was very excited. Its constructed well and is capable of adding additional support arms for adding additional storage options. Its modular so you can relocate the boxes in whatever position that suits you best. Being able to lock the storage boxes to the cart is a nice option and the fact that it can be used as a dolly when all t hff e boxes are removed is also handy.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY, CRACKS ALL OVER IT
customer_reviews.text: For a rugged case, it sure is garbage. The case arrived cracked but I din't realize it until I put a couple of tools in it. Then not even 24 hrs later i hear a popping sound and see a big crack on the back. I just don't get it. There must be deformities in the plastic as it's just been sitting and breaking constantly on it's own. I was really excited about this box too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Inconsistent with Price & Branding
customer_reviews.text: The plastic is cheaper than I’d prefer. The machining of the latches is is cheaper than I’d prefer. For a product line that is marketing as “tough” it’s lacking in toughness in some key areas. The product smacks of made in China and gives you a feeling of cut corners. Buy at your own risk, because building up this modular system could quickly become quite costly.
customer_reviews.author: JD R

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: I believe this is the best tool box for travel. I bought 2 extra large and 4 small. I like to stack them chain them then lock them for safe keeping. Without wheels I can fit in vehicles easier. -Affordable -Stepping stool -Saw pony -Break time seat This is a product meant to hold and carry tools. Not beat with hammers and bounce off the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Arnold Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Best overall toolbox in ToughSystems lineup
customer_reviews.text: I think this is the best overall toolbox in the Dewalt ToughSystems lineup. Room for all of my tools, and the screwdriver/pliers organizer is awesome. Perfect as a general toolbox. Big, but not too heavy. Extremely durable, watertight, no rusting parts. I absolutely love Dewalt ToughSystems toolboxes. Have pretty much every one of them now, with the exception of the cooler and stereo.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny Geha

customer_reviews.title: This is a handy organizer and is quite durable. ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a handy organizer and is quite durable. If you're using it to hold small items, e.g. washers, or trim nails, small items can fit between the clear plastic top and the individual contains. Consequently if you're carrying it around between places the items will not all stay in the correct container. For larger items it is not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Must have toolbox!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great waterproof box which has room for several wireless tools and their attachments. It has an airtight system that keeps my tools dry even when I leave them on the back of my pickup during major rain storms. It is sturdy and has more room for tools than some other brands. I love it and have got the set of four which connects on the box that has wheels!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Strongest box and weather resistant BEST INVESTMENT!
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell you about this box.very strong and rugged literally fell out of a moving car going about 60 mph didn’t crack just a few scuffs,dropped multiple times! Nothing happened,love these cases they protect my money making tools.been through so many jobs with these boxes and they been a life saver in so many ways possible,been in the rain multiple times tools were all dry as a bone ,also not a bad idea also to keep silica packets inside it.also a nice seat when you wanna sit down, you got a DEWALT fan for life ! NOTHING BUT HEAVY DUTY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Schenk

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Positive: Fits all my powered hand tools. Negative: Fits all my powered hand tools. Lol! This box is deep. I probably could’ve used the Large instead of the XL. It is heavy and akwurd to carry once I fully load it as it can hold a lot. It dust proof and closes tight. Like this box but Ibwill also purchase the more manageable Large one.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Darn Tough.  Darn Big.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for to organize emergency and other stuff in the truck. Big enough for a fire extinguisher, first aid kits, flares, tool kit, blanket, etc. Seems super rugged and durable. Lid feels like it sucks down tight to the gasket. Have not left it out in the rain to test, but am sure contents would be just fine if i did.
customer_reviews.author: R. Jimerson

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth It
customer_reviews.text: The bad news with this system is that it isn't cheap. Nothing DeWalt is. The good news is that it works great! And when you get a few of these together lined up on a wall it makes for a clean, impressive installation. High quality tools, and they seem like they will last forever. Just pony up and get the system.
customer_reviews.author: John Pozadzides

customer_reviews.title: This unit is not that much better than my old Dewalt radio/charger for the extra money
customer_reviews.text: This unit is not that much better than my old Dewalt radio/charger for the extra money. It does NOT pick up stations any better here in hilly VT. It DOES NOT have any outlets in it like the old one to power other small 120 volt loads. It is slow to charge batteries. It does however, have great sound.
customer_reviews.author: mattywho

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great
customer_reviews.text: Good, not great, when the Tough Large case arrived and i opened the case to look at the depth and judge what tools would go in it - I noticed a few chips of pieces so that quality control wasn't as high as I hoped. However I purchased a second tough large case and it was much better, then I purchased a tote and it was great....must've had a bad day at the factory on my first one or damaged in shipment
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Built to last! Modular style toolbox/storage.
customer_reviews.text: Very tough and durable tool box/storage. Reminds me of the expensive pelican boxes for electronics, but for tools/hardware. Modular design makes for easy configuration to accommodate pretty much anything you'd want to store/transport or protect! So far it seems like these are made to last forever,I will gladly update this review should my feelings or experience using/owning these changes. I've got 6 of small ones stacked/locked into one big unit.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Overclock

customer_reviews.title: The design works well
customer_reviews.text: This is my second cart. I outgrew my first one now I have two. They are easy to load and unload in my truck, trailer whatever. Strong stable and versatile. To improve loading and unloading I added two 36" wooden runners to the back of the cart. This allows for more flexibility. Without them the wheels tend to catch on the ledge of the tailgate and edge of the trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Pantheon Commercial LLC

customer_reviews.title: Have them all, this one is harder to lock
customer_reviews.text: It feels like the mold was old, or the part didnt have enough time in the mold. The cover doesnt quite line up with the base pins, so on closing, you need to push the cover back and down, while squeezing it closed. This is the only box in the Tough Series I need to do this to, so I am not 100% sure if its a bad part, parts or design.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The BEST portable radio.
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! Right out of the box I slammed a battery in the back and was rocking. Bluetooth was easy to setup and sound quality is awesome. Charging is a bit slow, but that is to be expected when charging is a secondary function of the radio. The top box is a bit tough to open but that it due to it being a waterproof compartment. Replaced a RIDGID Bluetooth radio and puts it to shame. Would buy again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Jtee1000

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction
customer_reviews.text: The Dewalt tough system cases are solid and of good quality. I have been switching over all my toolboxes to these. Try using the kaizen foam inserts to hold your tools snug inside of these cases.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great sound. Battery life more than o
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Battery life more than o.k. Blue tooth range not far though. Maybe 20 ft then drops if around an obstacle. The sound is amazing. I've learned to leave the source of blue tooth close to radio because the radio will quiet momentarily if texted or called. I would recommend in a heart beat if sound quality and loudness is paramount. Nothing beats this for the money.
customer_reviews.author: J and K Mace

customer_reviews.title: my favorite of the portable tool carrying system bases
customer_reviews.text: It's very stout without being too heavy. It has been used and abused heavily with no issues. Attached stuff stays put, wheels roll well even with significant tool weight attached, very happy with this purchase. It is by far my favorite of the portable tool carrying system bases, and I have tried most of them.
customer_reviews.author: somber

customer_reviews.title: Its a nice way to keep things organized and accessible but a ...
customer_reviews.text: Expensive. Heavy, bulky, and takes up a bunch of space even with everything collapsed. Also a total PITA to adjust the individual arms. But when it is set up it sure makes a convenient way to roll around the tough system totes and whatnots. I use two of the large totes, and the box with the two pullout drawers for a rolling music equipment cart. Its a nice way to keep things organized and accessible but a space eater in the van, and flippin heavy.
customer_reviews.author: W. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Tough
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 of this, and a DS450 from local store. As it mention. It is tough. I can stand on top of them and the shape wont change a bit. Some user may complain it is heavy. Yes, it is heavy. but this design for constructor, contractor while their tools help them make their living. Protection for the tools are very important to them. I would recommend this to people who would like to have maximum protection for their tools only.
customer_reviews.author: JY

customer_reviews.title: Fits almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fits almost perfect in the back of my rzr xp4 1000 infront of my spare tire carrier. I just had to trim off the front bottom corners a little. No big deal because it's just a ridge. I will see how waterproof and sturdy it is in the near future. If I have any problems I will post them. From the looks of the box I don't foresee any.
customer_reviews.author: Louie

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS NOT A 2 PACK!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tool box, and it's worth the money, but there IS NO EXCUSE for having that graphic on the picture of it that says "2 pack" WITH the Amazon logo. Let me know when you remove that logo, and I'll fix the review. False advertising!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Kressin

customer_reviews.title: This thing is solid! Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these--these things are absolutely solid. Interlocking and stackable make this awesome for the garage if you don't have the wall rack. This would almost be perfect but I have difficulty opening the drawer sometimes. The size of the drawers work well and once it's locked, it doesn't accidentally open.
customer_reviews.author: rbaby

customer_reviews.title: Its Dewalt!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Now this is the ds150 model and not the ds130. Huge difference between the 2. I can store my angel grinder and multi tool in the case along with battery and blades in the upper compartment. I also bought a 2nd one which has my impact driver, drill, battery and 3 small cases of bits. Very robust!
customer_reviews.author: Luis H. Molina Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Side latches do not match advertised photos.
customer_reviews.text: The cases were racked, the top would not close without closing one side then aligning the other to close. The top looked warped as well. I could not get the case side latches to close to stack them without pulling the bottom case up towards the top case an pushing the top case downward towards the bottom. Not sure if dewalt changed the latch style on purpose or if these were factory mistakes in any case they were returned. I have 3 of these clear cases an this was not a issue with them at all. Also the latches were not the same on these 2 new ones I purchased compared to the 3 other ones I previous purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I used these in my enclosed trailer. So far so good. A few of the boxes are pretty heavy and they have held up nicely. Makes my trailer super neat and it makes it easy to get to each box.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome worksite radio
customer_reviews.text: This radio is awesome! I have used it many times on the jobsite and for recreational use. The great sound it has with its built in subwoofer is phenomenal. On the jobsite, it has the additional benefit of charging my dewalt 20V batteries as I go. Extra plus is that it works perfect with my Dewalt ToughSystem tool box kit. Overall great buy, and would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: D. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound Quality... And Loud!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a Bose SoundLink Mini for years that I love. I’m very picky about sound quality. I do construction and finally beat the Bose to death. I wanted to move up to a sturdier Jobsite type stereo. After much research I decided on this Dewalt and I’m SO glad that I did. It sounds great, right there with my old Bose and it’s about 3 times as loud.
customer_reviews.author: Sandradot

customer_reviews.title: A great product with just a couple weaknesses.
customer_reviews.text: I only have two small beefs with this product. It is not made for tall people. It is short on the handles and puts the center of gravity low on your body. Another thing is that the wheels do not do well in dirt. You will have to upgrade to inflatable if you want to operate it and gravel and/or dirt.
customer_reviews.author: ninjajoe

customer_reviews.title: Sounds amazing
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, great bass, i thought it would fit my Dewalt T Stak system but it does not. Other than that this radio will blow any other jobsite radio out of the water and its not even close. I never gave it a review for the water and dust resistance only because i have really only used it inside a building trimming out not outside yet. Now if only Dewalt would make a good t stak system like Milwaukee's packout.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Great piece except.....
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a broken piece, so it cannot be snap locked onto the top of any other units. Everything else about it seems pretty good so far. The drawers are nice and big, they snap closed and seem to seal pretty well from dirt and debris. Only wish there was a way to lock the drawers. Over all great piece so far.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend it's DeWalt
customer_reviews.text: DeWalt has a great on this at Amazon and I was waiting for it to add it to my tough case collection. I love this the clear top provide an idea about what's inside the case. The easy to add and remove to the tough system is great. I love it and thank you DeWalt for always being my favorite tools option.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmad

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: The best tool/storage box I’ve ever used. Keeps the dust and rain out. I also have (2) DWST08130 ToughSystem Suitcase that I keep my drill, driver and angle grinder in. Now I don’t have to worry about rain.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Nash

customer_reviews.title: The brackets do not fold in on this system buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I really do not know what the quality is but I will get back to you after a few months I was very disappointed to find out that these brackets did not fold in like they show all the other brackets folding in nor did it mention the brackets were non-foldable it’s almost a dealbreaker and I would like to send it back to Amazon but I need to get this trailer set up ASAP so for the non-information I gave this item 2 stars buyer beware the brackets do not fold in very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: AR W.

customer_reviews.title: Typical dewalt
customer_reviews.text: Great case. Expanding our 20v stuff, needed more storage. It's like the other stuff in this range, well thought out and will take pretty much anything you can throw at it.
customer_reviews.author: dorkface

customer_reviews.title: ,Darn great tool box
customer_reviews.text: Now this is a tool box ,Made thick and strong with a lot of storage space as well, also a place to put screw drivers, testers. anything tool wise which is small on the side of the toolbox inside .Comes with a sturdy tray to put the smaller tools as well .Worth 44 bucks all day long .
customer_reviews.author: bobby

customer_reviews.title: A+ best dewalt radio
customer_reviews.text: June 2017: Great radio, has best radio reception out the other dewalt radios I had, works great on atv, great for storing phone and charging it, and the Bluetooth works great, had radio playing for about 10 hours with one battery Update: October 2020 radio lasted so far , with one problem I left it out in the sun in 100 degrees at the beach and I think a part inside burn up, still works and sounds great but every so often it wont charge a battery or the temperature warning light comes on. Other than that still a great loud radio
customer_reviews.author: Manfred U.

customer_reviews.title: I like these organizers
customer_reviews.text: I like these organizers. They are tough and you can arrange the cups in any configuration. I even bought 6 of them as I have a lot of fasteners to organize. However, why in the world would you design something that allows the hing pins for the lid to simply slide out (and I mean like greased lightning) when you barely tip it on it's side. Really DeWalt? You should be ashamed of yourself on that. What is my fix for this?
customer_reviews.author: William E.

customer_reviews.title: Great toolbox
customer_reviews.text: It's a little expensive considering there are plenty of alternatives, but my garage is almost entirely Dewalt branded at this point so I figured I'd keep everything matching. I am pleased with the quality of it, it seems very sturdy and like it will last a very very long time.
customer_reviews.author: J Berg

customer_reviews.title: Great stereo
customer_reviews.text: Been in the business for 30 years have had a lot of radios just upgraded my entire system brushless 20 volt DeWalt system also there's tough box system DeWalt has really stepped up their game we added the stereo this season and it performs excellent and awesome sound quality runs on 1 battery all day easy Bluetooth book up to your phone
customer_reviews.author: John kuhn

customer_reviews.title: different application
customer_reviews.text: This is going to be a storage box mounted in the bag well of my Club Car Precedent golf cart. It fits perfectly and will provide me with storage that is easily removed for when I take the cart to the course but gives my a place to pack groceries home from the store.
customer_reviews.author: Kcc247

customer_reviews.title: awesome work radio
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended. radio sounds and functions great,!! Battery is kind of weird to insert but works fine.. will not hold 6.0 batteries, only 5.0 and below. Definetly not made for flexvolt batteries...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room and keeps the tools dry
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toolbox! I've wedged my 20v sawzall, drill, impact driver, area light, spot light, charger, and 4 batteries in it with the tray holding bits, blades, boxes of screws, and a tape measure. No worries about anything getting wet in the truck or on a job. Heavy duty latches won't break or fall off like other boxes. The 2 side handles are great for grabbing and sliding out from under my work bench. All I need now is the tough system cart to wheel it and a couple other things around.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: No lockable lid or lid accessory available
customer_reviews.text: Good idea. Faulty execution. Good sturdy box, just doesn't offer any lid. At all. You have to buy a complete top box kit to put on top. 3-stars overall. Pretty good idea, a sturdy rust proof box. Too bad you can't lock it. maybe you could stack it. But you can't lock it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C. Rawlings

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble dewalt quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble dewalt quality. Solved my problem of keeping my stuff stacked on the floor. You can configure the distance between cases to fit your need.
customer_reviews.author: ZENCO

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The carrier came in a HUGE box because the carrier comes 100% put together. Which was both a good thing, and a bad thing. The bad part was the carrier is extremely heavy which made carrying the ginormous box awkward and uncomfortable! Also, the box came busted up and broken but that is not the sellers fault. Overall, the product is perfect! Just beware it’s very heavy, bulky, and a pain to wrap!! Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Not Water Proof
customer_reviews.text: I bought several different Tough System cases. These are nice cases and yes they have a rubber seal (thinking they are waterproof by description) however these cases are NOT water proof. Air moisture/humidity will not enter the case, however if submerged (like mine in a flood), they will fill with water. It wasn't just one of them, everyone of them I bought had water to enter them.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell D.

customer_reviews.title: Good box’s but beware of the material !
customer_reviews.text: Have 18 of these box’s . I take care of my tools and box’s . Material is brittle not as strong as it should be for what you pay. Tabs on bottom slinging them in an out of a truck bed just normal use. Buy 99% Dewalt tools and box’s . Like keeping my tools and box’s like new . I keep them clean and organized but have to be careful with the tool box because of the material. Should be a lot stronger for the price !
customer_reviews.author: Terry St Onge

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: Best job site radio I've ever had the pleasure to hear. Loud as s*** and with bass turned all the way up no distortion at full volume. If you're disappointed with one of these you simply can't be pleased! I've purchased hundreds if not thousands of items from Amazon and never wrote a review but just had to for this.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Schmitz

customer_reviews.title: A Cool Cooler
customer_reviews.text: I like the overall design and construction. The built-in bottle opener is cool. A little bulky, but nice addition to the tough system collection. I love DeWalt tools and storage systems.
customer_reviews.author: Myron Perreira

customer_reviews.title: Good: Amazing sound
customer_reviews.text: Good: Amazing sound, great battery efficiency. Also, I'm not sure if it was an intended feature when when you keep the center storage compartment open doubles as a stable tablet holder. Bad: Lacks any sort of side locking handles which can be annoying when using this with the cart. Not sure why the most delicate and expensive toughsystem item lacks a simple safety feature that even the worst toughsystem items come with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not user friendly.
customer_reviews.text: I love the Dewalt ToughSystem overall. However, I would not recommend this particular tote as it’s difficult to carry due to the 45 degree downward handles, you need two hands to carry it, and it’s just not right. I do however want to try the new version that is advertised, but not yet for sale that I can find - that fixes all the above problems.
customer_reviews.author: andrew Schlagel

customer_reviews.title: Read reviews
customer_reviews.text: Showed up to my place with a broken/split handle. So make sure you go over it by checking for damage. I just a different style dewalt box show up with a hole chunked out of it and with shipping box damaged and attempted to be repaired. Look liked someone kicked it across the parking park.
customer_reviews.author: jeffery

customer_reviews.title: Made Well, very durable....
customer_reviews.text: These cases are built tough and designed to protect virtually anything you store in them. I use them to store my gazillions of cordless tools and their lithium Ion batteries indoors. I live in SW Florida and my garage gets too warm in summer to safely store these battery packs. So, I store them in a closet in my home to extend battery and tool life.
customer_reviews.author: Spike

product_meta.title: DEWALT Tough System Tool Storage Organizer (DWST08202),Black/Yellow
product_meta.description: Style:Clear-Lid OrganizerThis Organizer is part of the ToughSystem line and is made of durable 4 mm thick structural foam walls, giving it its robust structure. It contains 12 removable cups in two sizes for easy sorting and handling small parts. There is an integrated water seal for protection (IP65 rated) for dust and water resistance.
feature_bullets: Durable 4 mm thick structural foam walls
Clear lid is made of polycarbonate for resistance and full visibility
Integrated water seal in every unit IP65 rated protection against Dust and Water

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars4,097 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
